author: catwith1hat
content: Is there a reason that this community relies so much on the from the privacy point of view rather objectionable services of Telegram? Why not use Matrix? Open Standards for the win.

author: treyzania
content: Matrix does have a *lot* of protocol design issues for what it's worth, having used it for ~6 years now

author: catwith1hat
content: I agree. But I happily trade handing my privacy to some entity with unclear Russian ties for the inconvenience of  infrequent Matrix hiccups. Also Telegram hosts a lot of objectionable content.
